name: Text input
description: A text field form control for the user to type text in to. For simply displaying text, use the 'Text' object instead.

conditions.name: Compare text
conditions.description: Compare the text currently entered in to the text input.

params.name: Text
params.description: The text to compare the text input's text to.

params.name: Case
params.description: Choose whether the comparison is case sensitive (FOO different to Foo) or case insensitive (FOO same as Foo).

conditions.name: On text changed
conditions.description: Triggered when the text in the text input changes.

conditions.name: On clicked
conditions.description: Triggered when the text input is clicked.

conditions.name: On double-clicked
conditions.description: Triggered when the text input is double-clicked.

params.name: Text
params.description: The text to set in the text input.

params.name: Tooltip
params.description: The tooltip to set on the text input.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Choose whether to enable or disable read-only mode.

actions.name: Scroll to bottom
actions.description: Scroll to the bottom of the text input if a textarea.

actions.name: Append text
actions.description: Add text to the end of the existing text.

params.name: Text
params.description: Enter the text to append to the object's content.

actions.name: Set max length
actions.description: Set the maximum number of characters that can be entered.

params.name: Max length
params.description: The maximum number of characters that can be entered. Use -1 for unlimited.

expressions.name: Text
expressions.description: Get the text input's current text.

expressions.name: MaxLength
expressions.description: Get the maximum number of characters that can be entered, or -1 for unlimited.
